description:
Light enough for serious ski mountaineering, yet burly enough to tackle whatever the descent delivers. The 90mm width underfoot makes this ski ideal for light and fast missions in firmer conditions. Lightweight construction and technology focus on saving weight so your legs can enjoy the uphill lap after lap. Early rise in the tail gives it easy turn initiation while the classic camber underfoot adds to stability and edge hold.

  • Light Paulownia wood core keeps the ski nimble and easy to manoeuvre
  • Semi cap sidewall construction with carbon fiber and mixed glass laminate for torsion and flex control
  • Shorter turn radius enables precise control on steep icy terrain
  • Progressive front rocker with medium classic camber for good edge stability
  • Intermediate flex for performance on a variety of snow conditions
  • Layer of carbon and mixed glass laminate keeps the weight low while increasing the ski's dampness
  • Titanal reinforcement plate accommodates a wide range of bindings
  • Sintered graphite base is durable and fast
name: Black Crows Orb Freebird 90 Skis - Unisex
